item.title: Wellen Park establishes nighttime curfew for anyone under the age of 17
item.description: Wellen Park's new Accompanied Minor Policy/Curfew is now in effect.

item.title: DeSantis announces $50M charter school expansion in Miami with Success Academy
item.description: DeSantis announces $50M charter school expansion in Miami with Success Academy

item.title: Venice police seize one-quarter kilo of fentanyl in I-75 arrest
item.description: Venice police seize one-quarter kilo of fentanyl in I-75 arrest

item.title: Organizations demanding of ICE detainee from Manatee County
item.description: Groups are urging that a Suncoast man be released from custody in order to care for his gravely ill wife.

item.title: Punta Gorda man now charged federally in synagogue arson case
item.description: Police Chief Pamela Smith condemned the crime, calling it “a despicable act.”

item.title: Open carry begins in Florida
item.description: Earlier this month, a Florida Appeals Court ruled the state’s ban on openly carrying firearms is unconstitutional.

item.title: Florida Second Amendment Sales Tax Holiday: Firearms, ammo, camping gear tax-free through Dec. 31
item.description: The state says the holiday is designed to highlight outdoor traditions.

item.title: Venice Police easily solve the case of the purloined pickleball paddles
item.description: The suspected thief has also been trespassed from the park.

item.title: Trump signs executive order supporting proposed deal to put TikTok under US ownership
item.description: President Donald Trump signed an executive order declaring that a proposed deal allowing TikTok to continue in the United States.

item.title: Family members save children when mother tries to drown them, deputies say
item.description: Family saw Willingham throw children into the water before jumping in and holding them underwater.

item.title: Venice woman posed as real estate agent and scammed couple out of thousands, police said
item.description: The victim was forced to spend an additional $11,000 on alternative housing.

item.title: Suspected hazardous material found in Venice self-storage facility
item.description: Fire department crews secured the scene on Jacaranda Boulevard and safely disposed of the material.

item.title: All eyes on the tropics
item.description: One year ago today we were watching hurricane Helene in the SE Gulf moving northward toward the Big Bend of Florida.
